Skull.description: -1. If you fail, randomly choose an enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it.

Cultist.description: -X. X is the amount of horror on you.

Tablet.description: -X. X is the base shround value of your location.

Elder Thing.description: 0. Either randomly choose an enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it, or this test automatically fails instead.

Skull.description: Reveal another token. If you fail, randomly choose an enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it. (Limit once per test)

Cultist.description: -X. X is the amount of horror on you. If you fail, take 1 horror.

Tablet.description: -X. X is the base shround value of your location. If you fail, take 1 horror.

Elder Thing.description: 0. Either randomly choose an enemy from among the set-aside Monster enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it, or this test automatically fails instead.
